Do not practice your work as an employee, but rather as a leader loves his country, and as a manufacturer loves his manufacture, and as an artist innovates his art .. # Book _ flashes_from_breaker
Istanbul has a very exceptional position for us. Istanbul is for us love, love, passion.
Serving Istanbul is the biggest bahtiyarlık for us. Istanbul is the same as Turkey, the essence is the summary.
We are doing what we are doing in Istanbul in order to reveal its history, culture, accumulation, lost treasures.
We look at the feeling of the nation at every step we throw in Turkey.
Neither Turkey nor Istanbul's feelings can only be attributed to certain segments, groups, masses.
We are not in the understanding that 'I want to be absolutely'. But nobody can be in the understanding that 'I do not want it then this will not be done'.
We resisted with great care for 10.5 years to rule the minority of the majority.
Egypt is the true brotherhood of Turkey. Cairo is the true sister of Istanbul.
Our holy book, the Qur'an, was written in Mecca, read in Cairo, and written in Istanbul.
We watch the developments in Egypt with concern. We are by the peace, stability and democracy of Egypt.
All Egyptians are our sibling. We see the whole of Egypt together and together, embracing the whole as our brothers.
Whichever strike is aimed at, whichever target it is, it is bad, bad, harmful, killer of democracy and future.
It was a privilege to watch @Andy_Murray making history at #Wimbledon, and making Britain proud.
Egypt's so-called administration can make statements that "Turkey is involved in our internal affairs." We do not interfere in anyone's internal affairs.
We are with the people of Egypt. We want the Egyptian people to avoid any kind of conflict.
I send our most hearty greetings to all our Egyptian brothers. The people of Turkey are near Egypt.
